oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Southern Railway at K-25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A crane is poised above a railroad car. Three men, one in a locomotive, the others near the railroad car, observe the crane.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: K-25; Machinery; Oak Ridge Gaseous Diffusion Plant; Railroad cars; Railroad employees; Railroad locomotives; Railroads
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of September 26, 1946. This is the same location as TRN 0110.
